original_text: Their Redeemer is strong; the Lord of hosts is his name. He will surely plead their cause, that he may give rest to the earth, but unrest to the inhabitants of Babylon.
korean_text: 그들의 구원자는 강하니 그의 이름은 만군의 여호와라 반드시 그들 때문에 싸우시리니 그 땅에 평안함을 주고 바벨론 주민은 불안하게 하리라

sentences.original_text: the Lord of hosts is his name
He will surely plead their cause
that he may give rest to the earth
but unrest to the inhabitants of Babylon
